entry.p: Refer to Electromagnetic Compatibility chapter (Common Mode Choke Selection).Optional. Populating will not reduce the supported length.
Cable length: 355 mm for micro-coax with the following assumptions
25 mm assembly insertion loss >= -0.62 dB @ 4.05 GHz
355 mm cable assembly insertion loss >= -5.1 dB @ 4.05 GHz

Refer to "ADL_TwistedPair_CableSpec_eDP_TWP_Rev0p7" document #644925. This document describes the electrical parameter limits for the twisted pair cables assumed for this topology. It does not consider any EMI/ RFI risks.
Must adhere to fiberweave related best routing practices (#406926).
This recommendation is applicable to eDP HBR2 Main Link topology for panels comply to the VESA eDP HBR2 standard equalization.
